title: SITLEARN | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Advance your lifelong learning journey with SITLEARN. Gain work-ready competencies and thrive in an era of disruption.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Learn in-demand skills. Expand your career opportunities.
Advance your lifelong learning journey with our industry-informed courses and thrive in an era of disruption.
Unlock your potential with new skills and knowledge, gained through experiential learning that goes beyond the classroom.
provide a holistic learning experience that seamlessly blends theory and hands-on application. You'll gain competencies that can be applied at the workplace, giving you a competitive edge.
Designed for busy professionals and executives, our courses are designed for those with ambition to grow in their career.
Find the right course for you

Hone key skills from five domains with our wide variety of short courses. Our portfolio of short SkillsFuture-funded courses will help you contextualise and apply concepts to tackle real-world challenges.
Whether you are looking to enhance your skills or explore new areas of expertise, our learning pathways provide the flexibility and recognition you need to succeed.
Be industry-recognised. Advance your career with industry-recognised licences and certificates through preparatory courses or examinations.
Enhance your employability in new sectors or job roles through industry projects. Get a leg up through the SkillsFuture Career Transition Programme where you learn by doing.
Transform your organisation with custom learning solutions
Tailored to your organisation's specific training needs, we can help you design and develop custom courses to grow key talent and build specialist expertise to meet the future demands of work.
National Centre of Excellence for Workplace Learning (NACE)

We equip businesses with leading practices, expertise, and networks to enhance their workplace learning initiatives. Backed by SkillsFuture Singapore (SSG), our mission is to assist organisations, particularly SMEs, in developing workplace competencies. This enables employees to acquire new skills in their work environment, preparing them to effectively navigate a rapidly changing economic landscape.
Over the years, we have impacted over 25,000 participants from 1,300 companies, helping them to maximise their potential and develop market-relevant skills.
Our courses emphasise the integration of theory and hands-on application, enabling learners to gain practical experience and real-world skills.
We work closely with industry partners, trade associations, agencies and ministries to align our courses with Industry Transformation Maps and SkillsFuture Singapore's Skills Framework.
Our courses are regularly reviewed to reflect emerging trends and developments. This ensures that learners leave with the skills and knowledge needed to succeed.
Agile Orientation for Digital Transformation: Concepts, Practices and Mindsets
Master Agile methodology in this 2-day course. Gain theory, practical skills, and toolkits for real-world implementation and success
District Cooling Systems: Technologies, Components, and Sustainable Engineering
Learn the fundamentals of district cooling systems, including technologies, engineering principles, and sustainability strategies, to optimise efficiency and minimise environmental impact.
Sustainability, Energy Efficiency, Chemical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering
CHE6031N01 Process Safety Management and KPIs
Learn about effective Process Safety Management systems and associated performance measurement to ensure safe plant operations.
Graduate Certificate in Process Safety Management and Engineering Design
This course is a collaboration with Tan Tock Seng Hospital. It aims to equip participants with core competencies of RTWCs to assess and facilitate the early RTW of ill or injured workers.

This programme aims to empower enterprises to gain greater insights and elevate their people capabilities through a range of strategic HR interventions to stay competitive in a dynamic business landscape.

Earn Specialist Certificates to broaden your career prospects in IT. Stack them towards a degree in Applied Computing with our unique Competency-based Stackable Micro-credential (CSM) Pathway designed for working professionals.
BSc (Hons) in Applied Computing (via the CSM Pathway)

AI and Machine Learning, Data Science and Analytics, Computer Architecture, Computer Ethics and Privacy, Programming and Software Development, Networking and Security, User Experience Design, Cloud Computing, Competency-based Education

Earn Specialist Certificates to broaden your career prospects in Electrical and Electronic Engineering. Stack them towards a degree in (EE) Engineering with our unique Competency-based Stackable Micro-credential (CSM) Pathway designed for working professionals.
BEng (Hons) in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (via the CSM Pathway)
Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Power and Clean Energy, Sustainability, Data Science and Analytics, Robotics and Automation, Advanced Manufacturing, Competency-based Education

Earn Specialist Certificates to broaden your career prospects in Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Stack them towards a degree in (IS) Engineering with our unique Competency-based Stackable Micro-credential (CSM) Pathway designed for working professionals.
BEng (Hons) in Infrastructure and Systems Engineering (via the CSM Pathway)
Mechanical Engineering, Systems Engineering, Robotics and Automation, Transport Engineering, Advanced Manufacturing, Competency-based Education
Subscribe now and receive our brochure for the latest updates on our courses, events and insights.
By clicking "Subscribe", you agree to our "

" and also agree that SIT (and its service providers and agents) may collect, use, disclose and/or process your personal data to send you information related to the topic(s) of interest you have selected above, which may include information on courses, seminars, events, resources and/or surveys offered by SIT and/or its Overseas University partners.

We look forward to journeying with you on your path of lifelong learning. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the links provided in our communications. To learn more about how SIT protects your personal data, you may refer to SIT's Personal Data Protection Policy

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
SIT reserves the right to make changes to published course information, including dates, times, venues, fees and instructors without prior notice.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.

Learn in-demand skills. Expand your career opportunities.
Advance your lifelong learning journey with our industry-informed courses and thrive in an era of disruption.
Unlock your potential with new skills and knowledge, gained through experiential learning that goes beyond the classroom.
Our courses at SIT
LEARN
provide a holistic learning experience that seamlessly blends theory and hands-on application. You'll gain competencies that can be applied at the workplace, giving you a competitive edge.
25,000 +
Participants trained from 1300+ companies
400 +
Trainers and thought leaders
290 +
Courses offered since 2021
5
Key domains
Courses for Individuals
Designed for busy professionals and executives, our courses are designed for those with ambition to grow in their career.
Find the right course for you
Take a Course
Hone key skills from five domains with our wide variety of short courses. Our portfolio of short SkillsFuture-funded courses will help you contextualise and apply concepts to tackle real-world challenges.
Learn more
Earn Stackable Certificates
Whether you are looking to enhance your skills or explore new areas of expertise, our learning pathways provide the flexibility and recognition you need to succeed.
Learn more
Obtain a Professional Certification
Be industry-recognised. Advance your career with industry-recognised licences and certificates through preparatory courses or examinations.
Learn more
Make a Career Transition
Enhance your employability in new sectors or job roles through industry projects. Get a leg up through the SkillsFuture Career Transition Programme where you learn by doing.
Learn more
Courses for Organisations
Transform your organisation with custom learning solutions
Tailored to your organisation's specific training needs, we can help you design and develop custom courses to grow key talent and build specialist expertise to meet the future demands of work.
Learn More
Courses for Workplace Learning
National Centre of Excellence for Workplace Learning (NACE)
We equip businesses with leading practices, expertise, and networks to enhance their workplace learning initiatives. Backed by SkillsFuture Singapore (SSG), our mission is to assist organisations, particularly SMEs, in developing workplace competencies. This enables employees to acquire new skills in their work environment, preparing them to effectively navigate a rapidly changing economic landscape.
Learn More
Why SIT
LEARN
Over the years, we have impacted over 25,000 participants from 1,300 companies, helping them to maximise their potential and develop market-relevant skills.
Experiential, authentic learning
Our courses emphasise the integration of theory and hands-on application, enabling learners to gain practical experience and real-world skills.
Aligned to industry needs
We work closely with industry partners, trade associations, agencies and ministries to align our courses with Industry Transformation Maps and SkillsFuture Singapore's Skills Framework.
Relevant, in-demand courses
Our courses are regularly reviewed to reflect emerging trends and developments. This ensures that learners leave with the skills and knowledge needed to succeed.

updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");

    function updateCheckboxVal(attrName) {
        if (attrName) {
            var checkboxName = attrName + "_checkbox";
            var intAttr = document.getElementsByName(attrName);
            var intCheckbox = document.getElementsByName(checkboxName);
            if (intCheckbox && intAttr) {
                intAttr[0].value = intCheckbox[0].checked;
            }
        }
    }

    function updatesUponSubmit() {
        var checkboxes = document.querySelectorAll('[data-group="check-box-group"]');
        var boxSelected = false;
        for (var i = 0, l = checkboxes.length; i < l; i++) {
            if (checkboxes[i].checked) {
                boxSelected = true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (boxSelected) {
            var gmt8Date = new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", { timeZone: "Asia/Singapore" });
            const now = new Date().toUTCString();
            var optinEmailDate = document.getElementsByName("OptinEmailDate");
            var createdDate = document.getElementsByName("CreatedDate");
            var formSubmissionDate = document.getElementsByName("FormSubmissionDate");
            var primaryKey = document.getElementsByName("PrimaryKey");
            var getEmail = document.getElementById("email").value;
            var getWebsource = document.getElementById("websourceID").value;

            optinEmailDate[0].value = now;
            createdDate[0].value = now;
            formSubmissionDate[0].value = now;
            primaryKey[0].value = getEmail + getWebsource + gmt8Date;
			
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");
			
        } else {
            var checkboxes = document.querySelector('.error-message');
            checkboxes.classList.add('active');
            return false;
        }
    }
